name: Adept Negotiator
benefit: Standard action make a Persuasion check vs Will Defense (+5 bonus if opponent higher level); target moves -1 down condition track; if at end, target cannot attack unless attacked or allies attacked.

name: Aggressive Negotiator
benefit: When you damage an opponent with a lightsaber, you can take 10 on Persuasion checks.

name: Consular's Wisdom
benefit: Once per encounter, one ally in line of sight adds your Wisdom bonus to Will Defense until end of encounter.

name: Force Persuasion
benefit: Use the Force instead of Persuasion for checks; considered trained in Persuasion.

name: Master Negotiator
benefit: As Adept Negotiator, but target moves two steps down the condition track.

name: Adversary Lore
benefit: Standard action; make a Use the Force check vs Will on a creature within 12 squares and line of sight; target takes -2 Reflex Defense against you and allies until the end of your next turn.

name: Know Weakness
benefit: Target of Adversary Lore takes +1d6 damage from successful attacks.

name: Cleanse Mind
benefit: Once per turn, remove an ongoing mind-affecting effect from one ally in line of sight.

name: Collective Visions
benefit: Force-users with Farseeing can aid another as a reaction within 6 squares.

name: Consular's Vitality
benefit: Once per round, grant one ally within 12 squares and line of sight hit points equal to 5 + Charisma modifier; you take -5 Use the Force until next turn.

name: Improved Consular's Vitality
benefit: When you damage an opponent, you can use Consular's Vitality as a free action.

name: Entreat Aid
benefit: Once per turn, one adjacent ally can aid another as a reaction to assist you if they have not already aided.

name: Force of Will
benefit: Gain +2 Will Defense permanently; all allies within 6 squares gain +2 Will Defense for the rest of the encounter if they remain within 6 squares.

name: Guiding Strikes
benefit: Allies adjacent to a target you damaged gain +2 melee attack rolls against that target.

name: Recall
benefit: Regain 2 Force powers when a Force Point is spent to regain a power.

name: Renew Vision
benefit: Once per encounter, regain all expended uses of Farseeing.

name: Skilled Advisor
benefit: Full-round action; one ally gains +5 on a skill check (or +10 if you spend a Force Point); cannot advise yourself.

name: WatchCircle Initiate
benefit: Use the Force DC 15; remove Farseeing and add 1 Force Point to an ally in line of sight; replaces normal effect.

name: Visionary Attack
benefit: You or an ally within 12 squares may reroll a missed attack by making a Use the Force check vs target's Will; spend one Farseeing; you take -5 Use the Force until the start of your next turn.

name: Visionary Defense
benefit: You or an ally within 12 squares may gain +5 Reflex Defense when attacked by making a Use the Force check vs target's Will; spend one Farseeing; you take -5 Use the Force until the start of your next turn.

name: Acrobatic Recovery
benefit: Make a DC 20 Acrobatics check to avoid falling prone.

name: Battle Meditation
benefit: Full-round action; spend a Force Point; allies within 6 squares gain +1 attack for the encounter while within 6 squares.

name: Improved Battle Meditation
benefit: Activate Battle Meditation as a swift action; range increases to 12 squares; enemies in the radius take -1 attack.

name: Close Maneuvering
benefit: Once per turn, designate a target; your movement does not provoke attacks of opportunity from that target if you move adjacent.

name: Defensive Acuity
benefit: While fighting defensively, deal +1 die damage with lightsaber and gain +2 to Block and Deflect.

name: Elusive Target
benefit: If you are in a melee, ranged attacks against you take an additional -5 penalty (on top of the firing-into-melee penalty).

name: Exposing Strike
benefit: When you damage an opponent with a lightsaber, you may spend a Force Point to make the opponent flat-footed until the end of your next turn.

name: Force Intuition
benefit: Use the Force instead of Initiative; you are considered trained in Initiative.

name: Forceful Warrior
benefit: When you score a critical hit with a lightsaber, gain a temporary Force Point to be used before the end of the encounter.

name: Guardian Strike
benefit: When you damage an opponent with a lightsaber, the target takes -2 attack against anyone but you.

name: Immovable
benefit: Attempts to move you involuntarily suffer a -5 penalty to their check or attack.

name: Mobile Combatant
benefit: If you end your movement adjacent to an opponent and they withdraw, you can move with them.

name: Resilience
benefit: Full-round action; move +2 steps up the condition track.

name: Clear Mind
benefit: You may reroll a Use the Force check to avoid detection by other Force users; must take the reroll even if worse.

name: Force Haze
benefit: Standard action; spend a Force Point to hide you and allies up to your class level; make Use the Force vs Will; lasts 1 minute or until you attack from haze.

name: Persistent Haze
benefit: If someone attacks from the haze, they lose concealment but the rest of the group retains it.

name: Unseen Eyes
benefit: Allies hidden in the haze can reroll Perception checks and keep the best; allies gain +2 damage against unaware foes.

name: Dampen Presence
benefit: Use the Force vs Will; the target does not remember interacting with you (+5 bonus if opponent is higher level).

name: Dark Side Sense
benefit: You may reroll a Use the Force check to sense the Dark Side; must take the reroll even if worse.

name: Dark Side Bane
benefit: When you use a damage-dealing Force power against a creature with Dark Side Score 1+, deal extra damage equal to your Charisma modifier (minimum 1).

name: Dark Side Scourge
benefit: Deal extra damage on melee attacks against Dark Side creatures equal to your Charisma modifier (minimum +1).

name: Resist the Dark Side
benefit: +5 Force bonus to all Defense scores against powers with the Dark Side descriptor and from Force users with a Dark Side score; effects scale with your Wisdom score.

name: Gradual Resistance
benefit: If you take damage from a Force power, gain +2 to all Defense scores against that power until the end of the encounter.

name: Master of the Great Hunt
benefit: +1 attack and +1 die of damage against beasts with a Dark Side Score of 1+.

name: Reap Retribution
benefit: If you take damage from a Force power, you deal +2 damage against that creature until the end of the encounter.

name: Sentinel Strike
benefit: When you attack a flat-footed opponent with a damage-dealing Force power or a lightsaber, add +1d6 damage.

name: Dark Retaliation
benefit: Once per encounter, activate a Force power as a reaction if you are targeted by a Dark Side power.

name: Sentinel's Gambit
benefit: Once per encounter, against an enemy with a Dark Side score 1+, the enemy loses Dexterity to Defense against your attacks until your next turn.

name: Sentinel's Observation
benefit: If you have concealment against a target, you may spend a Force Point to make the opponent flat-footed until the end of your next turn.

name: Steel Resolve
benefit: When you take a melee attack penalty of -1 to -5, apply double that number as a penalty to the target's Will Defense; may not exceed your base attack bonus.

name: Block
benefit: Negate a melee attack with a Use the Force check vs the attack roll; -5 penalty each additional time used in a round; must have an activated lightsaber, be aware, and not flat-footed; may spend a Force Point to protect an adjacent character.

name: Riposte
benefit: Once per encounter, make a lightsaber attack against an opponent you successfully Block (not against area attacks).

name: Cortosis Gauntlet Block
benefit: You can use Block with cortosis gauntlets; on a successful Block, targeted lightsabers are deactivated.

name: Deflect
benefit: Negate a ranged attack with a Use the Force check vs the attack roll; -5 penalty each additional time used in a round; must have an activated lightsaber, be aware, and not flat-footed; vs autofire: take half or no damage; may spend a Force Point to protect an adjacent character.

name: Redirect Shot
benefit: Once per round, redirect a blaster bolt you deflected to another target; not usable against autofire or non-blaster projectiles.

name: Precise Redirect
benefit: Whenever you successfully redirect a blaster bolt and hit, deal +1 die of damage.

name: Lightsaber Defense
benefit: +1 Reflex Defense while wielding an activated lightsaber, aware, and not flat-footed (max +3).

name: Lightsaber Throw
benefit: If the target is within 6 squares, you can throw your lightsaber and pull it back as a swift action with a DC 20 Use the Force check.

name: Precision
benefit: Against an adjacent opponent, on a successful lightsaber attack, reduce the target’s speed by 2 squares until the end of your turn.

name: Shoto Focus
benefit: +2 attack with a shoto or guard shoto when wielding a one-handed lightsaber.

name: Weapon Specialization
benefit: +2 melee damage.

name: Aversion
benefit: Until end of encounter, all squares within 2 squares of you are difficult terrain for enemies.

name: Disciplined Strike
benefit: When making an area attack, you can exclude a number of targets up to your Wisdom modifier.

name: Force Flow
benefit: When you roll a natural 1 on an attack or Use the Force check, gain +1 temporary Force Point until end of encounter.

name: Illusion
benefit: Use the Force vs Will Defense to create an illusion; see source details for specific effects.

name: Illusion Bond
benefit: You can see or hear as if standing in the space of your humanoid illusion.

name: Masquerade
benefit: Use the Force in place of Deception when creating a deceptive appearance.

name: Influence Savant
benefit: Once per encounter, return one mind-affecting Force power to your suite without spending a Force Point.

name: Suppress Force
benefit: Convince a target they cannot use the Force: Intelligence 3+, within 12 squares, Use the Force vs target’s Use the Force.

name: Link
benefit: Link with one ally within 12 squares and line of sight who is trained in Use the Force; as long as within 12 squares, they can aid another as a reaction; you take -5 to other Use the Force checks.

name: Telepathic Link
benefit: Establish a Use the Force link within 1 km to communicate as if speaking; once per encounter, may share a Force power between you and the linked ally.

name: Telepathic Influence
benefit: When you roll a natural 20 on an attack or Use the Force, you may grant the linked ally a Force Point instead of gaining powers.

name: Telekinetic Power
benefit: On a natural 20 with a Force power, immediately reuse Force disarm, grip, slam, thrust, or Move Object.

name: Move Massive Object
benefit: Use Move Object to make an area attack (sizes: Large 2x2, Huge 3x3, Gargantuan 4x4, Colossal 6x6); compare Use the Force to Reflex Defense.

name: Telekinetic Savant
benefit: Once per encounter, return Force disarm, slam, thrust, or Move Object to your suite without spending a Force Point.

name: Telekinetic Prodigy
prerequisites: Telekinetic Savant, Force Training (Move Object selected)
benefit: Gain an extra use of the selected power from disarm, slam, thrust, or Move Object.

name: Beast Trick
benefit: Use Mind Trick on beasts with Intelligence 2 or less; they cannot perform or understand complex directions.

name: Channel Energy
benefit: Convert energy from Negate Energy to activate any power in your suite.

name: Damage Reduction 10
benefit: Gain DR 10 for one minute.

name: Equilibrium
benefit: Remove a debilitating condition affecting you and return to normal, including moving up to the top of the condition track.

name: Force Recovery
benefit: When you use Second Wind, gain additional hit points: 1d6 per Force Point possessed (maximum 10d6).

name: Force Exertion
benefit: Designate one Force power; remove another power to refresh the designated power; you move -1 step down the condition track for 1 minute.

name: Force Focus
benefit: DC 15 Use the Force check to regain one Force power.

name: Force Harmony
benefit: Once per encounter, activate a Force talent that requires a Force Point without spending one.

name: Force Suppression
benefit: Attempt to rebuke a Force power; if you fail, lessen its effect by one step; only works on powers with variable effects.

name: Indomitable Will
benefit: Immune to all mind-affecting effects for 1 minute.

name: Telekinetic Stability
benefit: Negate forced movement when being moved against your will.

name: The Will to Resist
benefit: Once per turn, if your Will Defense is targeted, you may replace Will with a Use the Force check; you take -5 to Use the Force until the end of your next turn.

name: Consumed by Darkness
benefit: Take -5 to Will Defense to gain +2 attack.

name: Dark Side Savant
benefit: Once per encounter, return one dark side power to your suite without spending a Force Point.

name: Drain Knowledge
benefit: By touch, make a check vs target's Will Defense to drain knowledge; gain trained status in a skill or a Skill Focus if you already have the skill; target moves down the condition track; you gain a Dark Side Point.

name: Power of the Dark Side
benefit: When spending a Force Point on an attack, you may reroll the die; increase your Dark Side Score by 1.

name: Dark Presence
prerequisites: Charisma 13, Power of the Dark Side
benefit: You and allies within 6 squares gain +1 to all Defense scores until end of encounter while you remain conscious.

name: Revenge
benefit: Gain +2 attack and +2 damage if an ally of equal or higher level dies or is reduced to 0 hp within line of sight.

name: Dark Preservation
benefit: Increase your Dark Side Score by 1 to stop moving down the condition track.

name: Swift Power
benefit: Once per day, use a swift action in place of a move or standard action to activate a Force power.

name: Wrath of the Dark Side
benefit: When you roll a natural 20 with a damage-dealing Force power, do not regain powers for damage; target also takes half damage again at the start of your next turn.

name: Transfer Essence
benefit: If your Dark Side Score equals your Wisdom, upon death you become a dark side spirit able to possess others or enter an object.

name: Guardian Spirit
benefit: Your guardian spirit reveals immediate consequences of your actions; gain 1 bonus Force Point per day after 6 hours rest to enhance a Force power, technique, or secret.

name: Crucial Advice
benefit: Once per encounter, reroll a failed skill check with a +2 bonus.

name: Manifest Guardian Spirit
benefit: Your guardian spirit is present for the encounter within 6 squares; while within 12 squares, you gain +1 attack, +2 Use the Force, and +2 Will Defense; you can move the spirit 6 squares as a swift action once per turn.

name: Distracting Apparition
benefit: Enemies within 3 squares of the apparition take -2 Will Defense and -2 attack against you.

name: Vital Encouragement
benefit: Once per encounter, you gain hit points equal to 10 + half your Heroic Level.

name: At Peace
benefit: Gain +2 to all Defense scores until end of encounter or until you make an attack.

name: Focused Attack
benefit: Reroll an attack against an opponent with a Dark Side Score of 1+.

name: Attuned
benefit: When you roll a natural 20 on an attack against a foe with Dark Side Score 1+, you may activate any power with the light side descriptor.

name: Surge of Light
benefit: Once per encounter, return any light side power without spending a Force Point.

name: Feel the Force
benefit: Ignore all concealment for 1 minute.

name: Force Perception
benefit: Use the Force replaces Perception to avoid surprise, notice enemies, and sense deception or influence; you are considered trained.

name: Foresight
benefit: Reroll Initiative; on a natural 20, regain a Force Point.

name: Gauge Force Potential
benefit: Use the Force vs Will to detect Force sensitivity, number of powers known, and Force Points.

name: Motion of the Future
benefit: Expend farseeing from your suite; before end of your next turn, force an attacker to reroll an attack and keep the second result.

name: Psychometry
benefit: Target an object you hold; read impressions up to 5 years per level.

name: Visions
benefit: See into the past or future with farseeing, up to one year per your level.

name: Force Pilot
benefit: Use the Force instead of Pilot; you are considered trained in Pilot.

name: Force Reflexes
benefit: When activating a starship maneuver, reroll the Pilot check.

name: Instinctive Navigation
benefit: Use the Force replaces Use Computer for astrogation checks.

name: Heightened Awareness
benefit: Add your Charisma bonus to Perception checks.

name: Shift Sense
benefit: Gain low-light vision for 1 minute or the rest of the encounter, whichever is longer.

name: Double Agent
benefit: When you roll Initiative, make Deception vs Will Defense against a target in line of sight; if successful, that target cannot attack you until you harm an ally.

name: Protection
benefit: Make Persuasion vs Will Defense against a target in line of sight; if successful, one ally cannot be attacked until your next turn.

name: Enemy Tactics
benefit: When an enemy within 12 squares and line of sight gains a bonus, you also gain that bonus and any limitations.

name: Friendly Fire
benefit: If engaged in melee and a ranged attack misses you, apply the same attack roll to target the attacker’s opponent instead.

name: Feed Information
benefit: Grant one enemy +1 attack; one ally gains +2 attack.

name: Castigate
benefit: Make Persuasion vs Will Defense to impose -2 to all of the target’s defenses until the end of your next turn.

name: Dirty Tactics
benefit: Once per encounter, allies in line of sight gain +4 flanking bonus to melee attacks.

name: Ambush
benefit: If you are not surprised, you may forgo your standard action so non-surprised allies in line of sight gain an extra move or may reroll Initiative and keep the better result.

name: Misplaced Loyalty
benefit: Once per turn, make Persuasion vs Will Defense against all opponents in line of sight; the chosen target cannot attack you or one ally within 6 squares.

name: Two-Faced
benefit: Each once per encounter after you attack: if you use the same attack, you may attack as a reaction; or an opponent cannot attack you; or gain +2 attack if they haven't attacked.

name: Unreadable
benefit: +5 Will Defense vs checks to read your emotions; when you feint in combat, the target is flat-footed against you.

name: Noble Fencing Style
benefit: Use Charisma modifier in place of Strength modifier with light melee weapons or a lightsaber.

name: Demoralizing Defense
benefit: Against an enemy you just hit with a melee attack, deal half damage and impose -5 attack against you until your next turn; usable once per round.

name: Leading Feint
benefit: When you damage an opponent, you may attempt a Deception check to feint; if successful, one ally within 12 squares treats the target as flat-footed against your opponent.

name: Personal Affront
prerequisites: Noble Fencing Style, base attack bonus +5
benefit: Once per encounter, make a single melee attack against an adjacent enemy who just damaged you.

name: Transposing Strike
prerequisites: Noble Fencing Style, base attack bonus +5
benefit: When you hit an opponent with a melee attack, you may deal half damage and switch positions with the foe; does not provoke attacks of opportunity.

name: Assault Gambit
benefit: Once per turn, designate one ally and one target with line of effect; both roll Initiative and the winner makes a free attack against the other.

name: Direct Fire
benefit: Once per turn, designate one ally and one target without cover from you; the ally ignores the target’s cover bonus to Reflex Defense.

name: Face the Foe
benefit: +1 attack against a target if you do not have cover from that target.

name: Lead From the Front
benefit: If you damage a target with a ranged attack while not having cover from that target, allies gain +2 attack against that target and +5 on opposed Initiative checks.

name: Luck Favors the Bold
benefit: Gain hit points equal to 5 + half your level if at least one enemy in line of sight is aware and you lack cover against that enemy.

name: Presence
benefit: Use Persuasion as Intimidation as a standard action instead of a full-round action.

name: Demand Surrender
benefit: Once per encounter, if the opponent is at half hit points or less, make Persuasion vs Will Defense (+5 if the opponent is higher level); target cannot attack unless attacked or allies are attacked.

name: Fluster
benefit: Once per encounter, make an Intimidation check against an opponent in line of sight vs Will Defense; target may only take a swift action on their next turn (+5 if opponent is higher level).

name: Intimidating Defense
benefit: Once per encounter, if the opponent has attacked you, make Persuasion vs Will Defense; impose -5 on that attack (+5 if opponent is higher level).

name: Weaken Resolve
benefit: If you deal damage exceeding the target’s threshold, make Persuasion as a free action vs Will Defense; target flees for one minute but can spend a Force Point (or if higher level) to negate.

name: Improved Weaken Resolve
benefit: As Weaken Resolve, but the target continues fleeing beyond the initial duration.

name: Instruction
benefit: Once per encounter, one ally within 6 squares may use your skill modifier for a skill check (not Use the Force).

name: Idealist
benefit: Add your Charisma bonus instead of your Wisdom bonus to Will Defense.

name: Know Your Enemy
benefit: Select an enemy in line of sight and make Knowledge (galactic lore) vs DC 15 + target’s character level; learn up to two pieces of information about the enemy.

name: Known Dissident
benefit: Make Persuasion vs Will Defense against one opponent in line of sight; the opponent may not attack until your next turn (+5 if higher level).

name: Lead by Example
benefit: Once per encounter, when you deal damage, all allies gain +1 attack and +1 die of damage on non-area attacks for the remainder of the encounter.

name: Bolster Ally
benefit: Move an ally +1 step up the condition track and they regain hit points equal to their level if below half hit points.

name: Beloved
benefit: Each once per encounter: an ally within 6 squares gains +2 Reflex as a swift action; or when you attack and are attacked, the ally makes a free attack; or when attacked, allies in line of sight move 2 squares as a reaction.

name: Ignite Fervor
benefit: If you hit, grant an ally a damage bonus equal to their level.

name: Inspire Zeal
benefit: Ally’s attack moves the target one additional step down the condition track.

name: Inspire Confidence
benefit: All allies in sight gain +1 attack and +1 to skill checks for the encounter, or revive one unconscious ally.

name: Willpower
benefit: Once per encounter, grant allies in line of sight +2 Will Defense for the encounter, even if they leave line of sight; does not apply to you.

name: Inspire Haste
benefit: An ally may make a skill check as a move action instead of a standard action.

name: Born Leader
benefit: Once per encounter, all allies gain +1 attack while in line of sight and you remain conscious.

name: Distant Command
benefit: You do not lose Born Leader’s benefits if out of line of sight.

name: Rally
benefit: Once per encounter, allies in line of sight with less than half hit points gain +2 Reflex, +2 Will, and +2 damage.

name: Fearless Leader
benefit: Allies gain +5 Will Defense vs fear while in line of sight and you remain conscious.

name: Reactionary Attack
benefit: Once per encounter, as a reaction to an attack, an ally within 6 squares may make an immediate attack against the attacker.

name: Trust
benefit: Give up your standard action to grant allies an extra action on their next turn.

name: Coordinate
benefit: All allies in line of sight gain +1 when using aid another (maximum +5).

name: Unwavering Ally
benefit: Once per turn, one ally in line of sight is immune to effects that make them flat-footed or deny Dexterity to Reflex Defense.

name: Connections
benefit: Acquire equipment worth your character level × 1000 credits; reduce black market multiplier by 1.

name: Influential Friends
benefit: Once per day, friends may take 20 on a skill check with modifier equal to 5 + half your heroic level; time taken is 10 × result minimum.

name: Powerful Friends
benefit: Once per encounter, take 20 on a Persuasion check with no increase in time required.

name: Educated
benefit: You may make Knowledge checks untrained.

name: Engineer
benefit: Trained in Mechanics; time to install new vehicle systems reduced by 25%.

name: Spontaneous Skill
benefit: Once per day, make a skill check as if trained; may be used multiple times per day with separate skills.

name: Wealth
benefit: At every level, gain credits equal to class level × 5000.

name: Inspire Loyalty
benefit: Gain one follower with Armor Proficiency feat and trained in Perception; may be taken up to three times.

name: Undying Loyalty
benefit: Followers gain the Toughness feat.

name: Punishing Protection
benefit: Once per encounter, as a reaction when you are damaged by an attack or Force power, your follower may attack that opponent.

name: Protector Actions
benefit: When you attack: redirect the attack to your follower, move your follower toward the target, or impose -1 attack per follower on ranged attacks against the target.

name: Cast Suspicion
benefit: One enemy in line of sight loses all insight and morale bonuses on attacks and cannot be aided until the end of your next turn.

name: Friend or Foe
benefit: Once per turn, when an ally in line of sight is missed by a ranged attack, compare the missed attack against an adjacent enemy to see if it hits.

name: True Betrayal
benefit: Make Persuasion vs Will Defense of one enemy in line of sight to compel them to attack a target you choose; +5 bonus if they are higher level.

name: Stolen Advantage
benefit: When an enemy in line of sight aids another, grant +2 attack to one ally in line of sight and the enemy provides no benefit.

name: Distress to Discord
benefit: When an ally in line of sight takes Second Wind, all enemies within 2 squares lose Dexterity to Defense until the end of your next turn.

name: Seize the Moment
benefit: Once per turn, when an enemy is reduced to 0 hp or moves down the condition track, one ally in line of sight may take Second Wind as a free action and adds hit points equal to their character level.

name: Fool's Luck
benefit: For the rest of the encounter, choose one: +1 attack, +5 to skills, or +1 to defenses.

name: Avert Disaster
benefit: Once per encounter, turn a critical hit against you into a normal hit.

name: Better Lucky than Dead
benefit: Once per encounter, gain +5 bonus to one defense until the start of your next turn.

name: Dumb Luck
benefit: Each once per encounter after you attack: if you damage the target, gain +2 Reflex Defense against them; or if you are damaged, move 2 squares; or if you miss, gain +2 on your next attack.

name: Ricochet Shot
benefit: With a ranged attack, reduce the target’s cover by one step and deal half damage.

name: Uncanny Luck
benefit: Once per encounter, any roll of 16 or higher is treated as a natural 20.

name: Unlikely Shot
benefit: Once per encounter, reroll the damage of one attack.

name: Fortune's Favor
benefit: When you score a critical hit, gain a free standard action; must be used before your next turn or it is lost.

name: Gambler
benefit: +2 on Wisdom checks when gambling; may be taken multiple times.

name: Knack
benefit: Once per day, reroll a skill check.

name: Lucky Shot
benefit: Once per day, reroll an attack roll.

name: Lucky Stop
benefit: Once per encounter, negate the damage from a single attack that would reduce you to 0 hit points.

name: Labyrinthine Mind
benefit: Once per encounter, you become immune to mind-affecting effects until your next turn; the effect ends early if you choose to lose it.

name: Malkite Techniques
benefit: If your attack exceeds the target’s Fortitude Defense, the target is poisoned; poison attacks each round with d20 + your heroic level vs Fortitude, deals 1d6 + half your heroic level damage, and moves the target down the condition track until it misses or is cured.

name: Modify Poison
benefit: You can modify a poison’s delivery method with a Knowledge (life sciences) check; DC equals the Treat Injury DC.

name: Numbing Poison
benefit: A poisoned target is denied Dexterity to Reflex Defense as long as they remain poisoned.

name: Undetectable Poison
benefit: Increase the Treat Injury DC to detect or treat the poison by 5.

name: Vicious Poison
benefit: Poisons you use gain +2 attack against the target’s Fortitude Defense.

name: Befuddle
benefit: Make Deception vs Will Defense to move through a threatened area without provoking attacks of opportunity; movement through the area counts as 2 squares.

name: Disruptive
benefit: Suppress morale and insight bonuses for all in line of sight until your next turn.

name: Walk the Line
benefit: Enemies in line of sight take -2 to defenses until your next turn.

name: Cunning Strategist
benefit: Each once per encounter after you attack: if you damage the target, impose -5 Reflex; or reduce the target’s speed by 2; or against two opponents within 2 squares, each takes -5 attack but you roll damage once.

name: Dastardly Attack
benefit: An attack against an opponent denied Dexterity to Defense moves them -1 step down the condition track.

name: Weakening Strike
benefit: If you deal damage to an opponent denied Dexterity to Defense, you may impose -5 to attack and melee damage instead of moving them down the condition track.

name: Hesitate
benefit: Make Persuasion vs Will Defense within 12 squares; target’s speed is -2 and must spend a swift action with their standard action until their next turn.

name: Sow Confusion
benefit: Once per encounter, make Deception vs Will Defense against a target in line of sight; target must spend a swift action with their standard action to attack until your next turn.

name: Seducer
benefit: If you fail a Persuasion check to change attitude, reroll using Deception.

name: Seize Object
benefit: Once per encounter, seize an object from an adjacent target with +10 to Disarm; must have a free hand and cannot conceal the object.

name: Skirmisher
benefit: If you move at least 2 squares, gain +1 attack until your next turn.

name: Improved Skirmisher
benefit: If you move at least 2 squares and end in a different square, gain +1 to all defenses.

name: Sudden Strike
benefit: Deal sneak attack damage when you use Skirmisher.

name: Sneak Attack
benefit: If the opponent is flat-footed or denied Dexterity to Defense, deal +1d6 damage within 6 squares (maximum 10d6).

name: Stymie
benefit: Once per round, target within 12 squares and line of sight takes -5 to one skill until the start of your next turn.

name: Advantageous Opening
benefit: When an ally or opponent in line of sight rolls a natural 1 on an attack, you may make an attack against a single target.

name: Thrive on Chaos
benefit: When an enemy or ally within 20 squares is reduced to 0 hit points, you gain hit points equal to 5 + half your character level.

name: Retribution
benefit: If an enemy in line of sight moves an ally down the condition track, gain +2 attack against that enemy.

name: Vindication
benefit: When an enemy you reduced to 0 hit points or the bottom of the condition track, your next attack deals +1 die of damage.

name: Slip By
benefit: When you damage an opponent, you may move through that opponent’s square; attacks of opportunity apply as normal.

name: Fast Repairs
benefit: When you jury-rig a vehicle, it regains hit points equal to your Mechanics check result.

name: Hot Wire
benefit: Use Mechanics instead of Use Computer to improve computer access; you are considered trained.

name: Quick Fix
benefit: Once per encounter, jury-rig an object that is not disabled.

name: Personalized Modifications
benefit: For powered weapons you are using, gain +1 attack and +2 damage for the rest of the encounter.

name: Find Openings
benefit: If you are missed by an attack, gain +2 on your next attack before the end of your next turn.

name: Risk for Reward
benefit: Once per turn, if you are damaged by an attack of opportunity, make a single attack against a target.

name: Hit the Deck
benefit: Allies take no or half damage from your area attack.

name: Trick Step
benefit: Make an Initiative check against an enemy in line of sight; the loser is flat-footed against the other.

name: Lure Closer
benefit: Once per turn, make Deception vs Will Defense against one enemy within 12 squares and line of sight; the target must move half its speed toward you avoiding hazards (movement stops if a hazard cannot be avoided); does not provoke attacks of opportunity.

name: Opportunistic Strike
benefit: Once per encounter, make an attack of opportunity against an opponent in point-blank range if they provoke an attack of opportunity from an ally.

name: Cheap Shot
benefit: Once per encounter, make an attack of opportunity against an opponent that withdraws from an ally in point-blank range.

name: No Escape
benefit: When an opponent withdraws, that opponent is considered flat-footed against you until the end of your next turn.

name: Strike and Run
benefit: Once per encounter, after you damage an opponent, you may move your speed.

name: Slippery Strike
benefit: Once per encounter, designate an opponent you just damaged; that opponent cannot make attacks of opportunity until your next turn.

name: Electronic Forgery
benefit: Use Computer replaces Deception when using forged documents.

name: Electronic Sabotage
benefit: Your Use Computer check result replaces a computer’s Will Defense to change its attitude; the computer is considered unfriendly.

name: Virus
benefit: Substitute Use Computer for Mechanics to disable a computerized device; 1 minute vs Will Defense; device becomes unfriendly.

name: Gimmick
benefit: Issue a routine command to a computer.

name: Master Slicer
benefit: Reroll Use Computer checks to improve access to computers.

name: Security Slicer
benefit: Disable security without a security kit; on a failure by 10 or more, something goes wrong.

name: Trace
benefit: Substitute Use Computer for Gather Information if you have computer access.

name: Art of Concealment
benefit: Use Stealth to conceal items on your person; you can take 10 even if rushed; conceal as a swift action.

name: Fast Talker
benefit: Once per day, take 20 on a Deception check as a standard action when attempting to deceive.

name: Hidden Weapons
benefit: If a weapon you draw is unnoticed, the opponent is flat-footed; you may use Quick Draw as a swift action.

name: Illicit Dealings
benefit: Reroll Persuasion checks when haggling for restricted, military, or illegal goods.

name: Surprise Strike
benefit: If you fail a Deception check, make a single unarmed strike as a free action in the surprise round; or another attack with Quick Draw.

name: Hyperdriven
benefit: Once per day, add your class level to an attack, skill, or ability check.

name: Spacehound
benefit: No attack penalty in low or zero gravity; ignore space sickness; proficient with starship weapons.

name: Starship Raider
benefit: +1 attack aboard starships, including with personal weapons.

name: Cramped Quarters Fighting
benefit: +2 Reflex Defense when adjacent to an obstacle or barrier.

name: Stellar Warrior
benefit: On a natural 20 attack roll, gain an extra Force Point for the encounter.

name: Make a Break for It
benefit: Once per encounter, move up to half your speed on a vehicle, or half the vehicle’s speed if you are the pilot, without provoking attacks of opportunity.

name: Biotech Adept
benefit: Reroll Knowledge (life sciences) or Treat Injury checks to use or repair biotech.

name: Bugbite
benefit: Deal +1 die of damage with razor bugs and thud bugs.

name: Curved Throw
benefit: Ignore cover (not total cover) with razor bugs and thud bugs.

name: Surprising Weapons
benefit: If your attack with an amphistaff, thud bug, or razor bug also exceeds the target’s Will Defense, the opponent is flat-footed against you.

name: Veiled Biotech
benefit: +10 to Deception and Stealth to conceal biotech; draw biotech as a swift action; if you attack, the opponent loses Dexterity to Defense.

name: Acute Senses
benefit: Reroll Perception checks.

name: Expert Tracker
benefit: No penalty on Survival checks to track at normal speed.

name: Improved Initiative
benefit: Reroll Initiative checks.

name: Reset Initiative
benefit: Once per encounter after the first full round, add +5 to Initiative.

name: Uncanny Dodge I
benefit: Do not lose Dexterity bonus when flat-footed or attacked by hidden attackers.

name: Uncanny Dodge II
benefit: Cannot be flanked.

name: Keen Shot
benefit: Ignore penalties against opponents with concealment (except total concealment).

name: Weak Point
benefit: Once per encounter, ignore a single target’s DR for the rest of your turn.

name: Hunker Down
benefit: If benefiting from cover, increase cover by one step.

name: Improved Stealth
benefit: Reroll Stealth checks.

name: Hidden Movement
benefit: No penalty to Stealth at normal movement speed.

name: Hide in Plain Sight
benefit: Once per encounter, if within 2 squares of cover or concealment, move to it and make a Stealth check as a single move action.

name: Shadow Striker
benefit: Each once per encounter after you attack: if you deal damage, gain total concealment vs that target; or if the opponent lacks Dex to Defense or you are concealed and deal damage, the target can only take a swift action next turn; or if you have concealment, gain +2 attack (+5 with total concealment).

name: Total Concealment
benefit: Gain total concealment in place of any concealment.

name: Barter
benefit: Reroll Persuasion checks to haggle.

name: Fringe Savant
benefit: Natural 20 on a skill check grants one extra Force Point for the encounter.

name: Long Stride
benefit: Move +2 squares if wearing light or no armor.

name: Flee
benefit: Designate a single opponent and move away: +2 speed; no attacks of opportunity from that opponent.

name: Sidestep
benefit: Reduce diagonal movement cost to 1 if in light or no armor.

name: Swift Strider
benefit: Each once per encounter: move your speed and gain +2 Reflex until end of encounter; or no Defense penalty on a charge; or move and gain +2 Reflex vs attacks of opportunity until your next turn.

name: Surge
benefit: Once per encounter, move up to your speed.

name: Jury-Rigger
benefit: Reroll Mechanics checks to jury-rig.

name: Keep it Together
benefit: When you jury-rig a vehicle, it moves -2 down the condition track at end (instead of -5).

name: Deep-Space Gambit
benefit: Once per encounter, when you or your vehicle is targeted by an attack, force the opponent to reroll and take the worse result.

name: Guidance
benefit: Show an ally in line of sight how to ignore difficult terrain until your next turn (does not apply to you).

name: Hidden Attacker
benefit: Use the snipe action of Stealth as a swift action instead of a move.

name: Hyperspace Savant
benefit: Use Pilot in place of Use Computer for astrogation or operating sensors.

name: Vehicle Sneak
benefit: Treat your ship as two size categories smaller when making Stealth checks.

name: Reconnaissance Team Leader
benefit: Gain a follower trained in Perception and Stealth (max 3 times); follower can make Stealth checks with you.

name: Close-Combat Assault
benefit: Each follower gains the Point Blank Shot feat.

name: Get Into Position
prerequisites: Base attack bonus +5, Reconnaissance Team Leader
benefit: One of your followers gains +2 speed.

name: Reconnaissance Actions
benefit: When you attack: grant +2 ranged attack to each follower; or +1 Stealth to each; or +1 Perception to each if armed with ranged weapons.

name: Blend In
benefit: Use Stealth in place of Deception for a deceptive appearance; considered trained.

name: Incognito
benefit: Reroll Deception checks for a deceptive appearance.

name: Surveillance
benefit: Make Perception vs a target in line of sight (DC 15 or Stealth if higher); you and allies gain +2 attack until next turn and while out of the target’s line of sight.

name: Improved Surveillance
benefit: You and allies gain +1 to all defenses against the target.

name: Intimate Knowledge
benefit: Once per encounter, take 20 on a trained Knowledge check or take 10 on an untrained Knowledge check even if normally not allowed.

name: Traceless Tampering
benefit: Automatically leave no trace of tampering; on a failure by 10+, something goes wrong (instead of by 5).

name: Hidden Eyes
benefit: If you have concealment against a target, gain +5 Perception against that target.

name: Seek and Destroy
benefit: If you charge an unaware target, that target cannot make a Perception check to notice you.

name: Hunt the Hunter
benefit: While searching for hidden enemies, make one attack against one enemy you notice.

name: Spotter
benefit: Make Perception vs DC 10 + target’s level against a target in line of sight; you and allies gain +1 attack against that target.

name: Advanced Intel
benefit: If you are not surprised, you may use Spotter in the surprise round.

name: Evasion
benefit: If hit by an area attack, take half or no damage.

name: Extreme Effort
benefit: Gain +5 on a Strength check in the same round.

name: Sprint
benefit: Run up to five times your speed.

name: Surefooted
benefit: Speed is not reduced by difficult terrain.

name: Aggressive Surge
benefit: Once per encounter, when you take Second Wind, make a free charge.

name: Blast Back
benefit: Once per round, when damaged by an area attack, make an attack against the source if you have line of sight and range.

name: Second Strike
benefit: Once per encounter, when you miss, move half your speed and attack another target without provoking attacks of opportunity; with Combat Reflexes, uses equal to Dex bonus (max once per round).

name: Fade Away
benefit: Once per turn, when damaged by an attack, move half your speed without provoking attacks of opportunity.

name: Swerve
benefit: Once per encounter, negate an attack of opportunity and move half your speed without provoking; with Combat Reflexes, uses equal to Dex bonus (max once per round).

name: Adapt and Survive
benefit: When an enemy within 24 squares and line of sight gains a morale or insight bonus, you gain the same bonus until your next turn.

name: Unbalancing Adaptation
benefit: When you use Adapt and Survive, the enemy in line of sight is denied that bonus.

name: Defensive Protection
benefit: Add a Force Point result to any one of your defenses or to one adjacent ally until your next turn.

name: Quick on Your Feet
benefit: Once per encounter, move your speed.

name: Ready and Willing
benefit: You may take a readied action at the end of the current turn after an opponent takes its action.

name: Ambush Specialist
benefit: If you are not surprised, treat the first round as a surprise round to activate talents; in the surprise round, designate one enemy as a prime target and gain +2 attack against it until end of encounter.

name: Destructive Ambusher
benefit: Gain +1 die of damage against your prime target until end of encounter.

name: Keep It Going
benefit: If you reduce your prime target to 0 hit points, designate a new prime target.

name: Keep Them Reeling
benefit: Once per turn, make an opposed Initiative check vs your prime target; if you win, the prime target is flat-footed against you.

name: Perceptive Ambusher
benefit: Gain +5 Perception against your prime target until the end of the encounter.

name: Spring the Trap
benefit: If you and all allies roll higher Initiative than opponents, gain a surprise round even if opponents are aware.

name: Armored Defense
benefit: Your Reflex Defense bonus equals either your heroic level or your armor bonus.

name: Armor Mastery
benefit: Increase the maximum Dexterity bonus you can apply while wearing armor by +1.

name: Improved Armored Defense
benefit: Your Reflex Defense bonus equals either your heroic level + half your armor bonus, or your armor bonus.

name: Juggernaut
benefit: Armor does not reduce speed or distance moved.

name: Second Skin
benefit: Increase your armor bonus to Reflex Defense and equipment bonus to Fortitude Defense by +1.

name: Shield Expert
benefit: Once per encounter, spend a swift action to regain 10 shield rating (SR), up to the shield’s maximum, on an active personal shield.

name: Cantina Brawler
benefit: When flanked, gain +2 on unarmed attack rolls and damage.

name: Pick a Fight
benefit: During the surprise round, you and allies within 6 squares gain +1 attack; you retain the +1 attack against targets you damage.

name: Counterpunch
benefit: When you fight defensively, any adjacent creature that attacks provokes an attack of opportunity from you.

name: Expert Grappler
benefit: Gain +2 on opposed grapple checks.

name: Unbalance Strike
benefit: One opponent loses their Strength bonus to melee attack rolls against you (does not affect damage).

name: Grabber
benefit: You do not take the -5 penalty when using the grab action.

name: Gun Club
benefit: Use a gun as a melee weapon without penalty; with a bayonet, it counts as both a blade and a club.

name: Bayonet Master
benefit: With a full attack, treat a ranged weapon with bayonet as a double weapon, ignoring penalties for double-weapon attacks.

name: Hammerblow
benefit: If unarmed and holding no items, double your Strength bonus on unarmed attacks.

name: Make Do
benefit: No penalty when using improvised weapons.

name: Man Down
benefit: If an ally within 6 squares is reduced to 0 hit points, move up to your speed toward the ally without provoking attacks of opportunity.

name: Melee Smash
benefit: Gain +1 damage on melee attacks.

name: Devastating Melee Smash
benefit: Once per encounter, before making a melee attack, add half your level to the damage instead of +1.

name: Stunning Strike
benefit: When you deal damage with a melee attack and exceed the target’s threshold, move the target 1 step down the condition track.

name: Experienced Brawler
benefit: Each once per encounter after you attack: gain +5 dodge bonus; or +5 Fortitude or +5 Will Defense; or move 2 squares without provoking.

name: Unrelenting Assault
benefit: If you miss with a melee attack or your attack is negated, still deal your Strength bonus damage (minimum 1), or double your Strength bonus if attacking two-handed.

name: Strong Grab
benefit: When you grab an opponent, they must use a full-round action to break the grab (not a standard).

name: Sucker Punch
benefit: If your melee attack damages an opponent denied Dexterity to Defense, that opponent cannot make attacks of opportunity.

name: Gang Leader
benefit: Once per encounter, when you intimidate, gain +1 per ally within 6 squares and the target’s line of sight (maximum +5).

name: Melee Assault
benefit: With a melee attack against a target with your allies adjacent, if you also exceed Fortitude Defense, deal +1 die of damage and knock the target prone.

name: Melee Brute
benefit: With a melee attack against a target with your allies adjacent, if you also exceed Fortitude Defense, the target’s speed is -2 and takes -2 Reflex Defense on its next turn.

name: Melee Opportunist
benefit: Once per encounter, when an ally makes a successful melee attack against a target adjacent to you, make a reaction attack with +2 attack.

name: Squad Brutality
benefit: With a melee attack against a target with your allies adjacent, reroll damage and keep the better result.

name: Squad Superiority
benefit: If you and at least two allies are adjacent to the target, the target is flat-footed.

name: Battle Analysis
benefit: With a DC 15 Knowledge (tactics) check, determine which allies or opponents in line of sight are at half hit points.

name: Cover Fire
benefit: When you make a ranged attack, allies within 6 squares gain +1 Defense until your next turn.

name: Demolitionist
benefit: When using Mechanics to set explosives, deal +2 dice of damage; may be taken multiple times and stacks.

name: Draw Fire
benefit: Make Persuasion vs Will; target cannot attack anyone within 6 squares if you do not have cover.

name: Harm's Way
benefit: Once per round, shield an ally; attacks that would target the ally target you instead.

name: Indomitable
benefit: Once per day, move +5 steps up the condition track (not persistent conditions); may be taken multiple times.

name: Keep Them at Bay
benefit: When you aid another to suppress an attack, the enemy takes -5 on its attack instead of -2.

name: Tough as Nails
benefit: Catch a Second Wind one extra time per encounter.

name: Hard Target
benefit: Catch a Second Wind as a reaction instead of a swift action.

name: Combined Fire
benefit: Deal +2 damage against targets damaged by an ally since the end of your last turn.

name: Mercenary's Teamwork
benefit: Deal +2 damage against targets damaged by an ally since the end of your last turn (stacks up to +10).

name: Commanding Presence
benefit: Once per encounter, all enemies take -2 Will Defense; Persuasion becomes a class skill for you.

name: Feared Warrior
benefit: When you reduce an enemy to 0 hit points, make Persuasion vs targets within 6 squares; those targets take -2 attack for the rest of the encounter (once only).

name: Dirty Fighting
benefit: Once per encounter, if you damage an opponent, reduce the target’s damage threshold by 2 for the encounter.

name: Ruthless
benefit: When you deal damage over the target’s threshold, gain +2 damage against that target for the rest of the encounter.

name: Focused Warrior
benefit: When you deal damage, gain +5 Will Defense until your next turn unless you are surprised or flat-footed.

name: Mercenary's Grit
benefit: When affected by a debilitating condition, convert its penalty into a bonus for 1 round, then move down the condition track.

name: Mercenary's Determination
benefit: Double your speed for 1 round; must wait 5 rounds between uses.

name: Jet Pack Training
benefit: Activate a jet pack as a free action; no Pilot check required to land.

name: Burning Assault
benefit: Expend a charge to make an attack as a flamethrower; cannot use while flying.

name: Improved Trajectory
benefit: Increase fly speed by 2 squares.

name: Jet Pack Withdraw
benefit: Once per encounter, when an enemy moves adjacent, expend one charge to fly, move your speed, or withdraw.

name: Commanding Officer
benefit: Gain one follower with Armor Proficiency and Weapon Proficiency (rifles); may be taken up to three times.

name: Coordinated Tactics
benefit: Each follower gains the Coordinated Attack feat.

name: Fire at Will
benefit: You and one follower each make a ranged attack against a target in line of sight, each taking -5 to attack.

name: Squad Actions
benefit: When you attack: extend autofire by 1 square; or gain +2 damage; or gain +1 attack per follower if armed with ranged weapons.

name: Comrades in Arms
benefit: If within 3 squares of an ally, gain +1 attack.

name: Focused Targeting
benefit: If you damage an opponent, all allies within 3 squares gain +2 damage against that target.

name: Stick Together
benefit: If an ally moves, you may move before your next turn, ending within 3 squares of that ally.

name: Watch Your Back
benefit: If adjacent to an ally, you cannot be flanked.

name: Phalanx
benefit: If you provide soft cover to an ally within 3 squares, it becomes improved cover.

name: Crushing Assault
benefit: If you damage an opponent with a bludgeoning attack, gain +2 attack and +2 damage on your next attack against that opponent before the end of the encounter.

name: Devastating Attack
benefit: Reduce an opponent’s damage threshold by 5 with a single weapon group.

name: Disarming Attack
benefit: Ignore target’s armor bonus to Reflex Defense when disarming; once per encounter, gain +10 attack on a disarm attempt.

name: Impaling Assault
benefit: If you damage an opponent with a piercing attack, the opponent’s speed is -2 until the end of your next turn.

name: Improved Suppression Fire
benefit: When you suppress an enemy, that enemy takes -5 attack; if targeting with autofire, each enemy in the area takes -2 attack.

name: Penetrating Attack
benefit: Reduce opponent’s DR by 5 with a single weapon group.

name: Stinging Assault
benefit: If you damage an opponent with a slashing attack, the opponent takes -2 melee attack until your next turn.

name: Weapon Specialization
benefit: Gain +2 damage with a single weapon group.

name: Outrun
benefit: When you take an all-out movement as the pilot, gain +2 Reflex Defense.

name: Punch Through
benefit: When you pilot a vehicle, smaller vehicles attempting to dogfight take a -10 penalty instead of -5.

name: Small Target
benefit: If you pilot a colossal or smaller vehicle, capital ships take -20 to attack (not -10) and cannot score critical hits unless you would be hit.

name: Watch This
benefit: You can move into the same space as a frigate or larger without collision and may occupy the same space.

name: Close Cover
benefit: If you occupy the same space as a larger vehicle, gain +5 cover bonus.

name: Blind Spot
benefit: Against a vehicle two sizes bigger that must be adjacent, make an opposed Pilot check; if you win, your attack vs that target +2 and their attacks vs you -2.

name: Close Scrape
benefit: Against a colossal size or smaller vehicle, a successful Pilot check turns a critical hit into a normal hit.

name: Elusive Dogfighter
benefit: Opponents in a dogfight with you take a -10 penalty to attack.

name: Full Throttle
benefit: You may take 10 to increase speed; all-out movement is x5 instead of x4.

name: Improved Attack Run
benefit: You are not required to move in a straight line when making an attack run.

name: Keep It Together
benefit: Once per encounter your vehicle avoids moving down the condition track.

name: Relentless Pursuit
benefit: You may roll twice for a Pilot check to initiate a dogfight and take the better result.

name: Renowned Pilot
benefit: Allies within 6 squares can reroll one Pilot check and keep the best (once per ally).

name: Vehicle Focus
benefit: Gain +2 attack with a selected vehicle type and may take 10 on Pilot checks for that vehicle.

name: Vehicular Evasion
benefit: If hit by an area attack while moving, take half or no damage.

name: Juke
benefit: When fighting defensively, may negate one additional attack per round with vehicular combat.

name: Wingman
benefit: As a swift action, assist an allied starfighter within 2 squares to grant +5 Pilot in a dogfight.

name: Expert Gunner
benefit: Gain +1 attack with vehicle weapons.

name: Dogfight Gunner
benefit: No penalty with vehicle weapons even if you are not the pilot.

name: Quick Trigger
benefit: Can make attacks of opportunity with vehicle weapons.

name: Synchronized Fire
benefit: Once per encounter, coordinate an attack with an ally on the same target to overcome SR, DR, and Threshold together.

name: System Hit
benefit: A successful attack forces the target vehicle an additional step down the condition track.

name: Crippling Hit
benefit: If your attack moves a ship down the track, it may lose hyperdrive, weapons, or communications.

name: Great Shot
benefit: Reduce range penalties by one category (for example, short becomes point-blank).

name: Begin Attack Run
benefit: Designate a single target and gain +5 attack with an attack run.

name: Regroup
benefit: Once per encounter, move every ship in your squadron +1 up the condition track.

name: Squadron Maneuvers
benefit: Once per encounter, grant the prerequisite of a chosen talent to every ship in your squadron until the end of the encounter.

name: Squadron Tactics
benefit: Once per encounter, grant a maneuver you use to every ship in your squadron next round.

name: Concentrate All Fire
benefit: When you aid another's attack with a vehicle weapon, the attack deals +1 die damage; an ally may only benefit once per attack.

name: Escort
benefit: +10 threshold for you and an adjacent ally when adjacent to a colossal or smaller allied ship.

name: Run Interference
benefit: Negate an attack targeting an adjacent allied colossal or smaller ship using vehicular combat.

name: Wingman Retribution
benefit: Once per round, make a vehicle weapon attack at -5 against an attacker of an adjacent allied colossal or smaller ship if your attack deals damage.

name: Lose Pursuit
benefit: +5 to avoid entering a dogfight for you and an adjacent allied colossal or smaller ship.

name: Murderous Arts I
benefit: If you move an opponent down the condition track, they take +1d6 damage.

name: Murderous Arts II
benefit: If you hit an opponent you have marked, deal +1d6 damage.

name: Ruthless
benefit: Once per encounter, if you drop a foe to 0 hp or to the bottom of the track, you gain an extra standard action.

name: Shift
benefit: Move 1 square without provoking attacks of opportunity.

name: Advantageous Positioning
benefit: An opponent you flank is treated as flat-footed.

name: Get Some Distance
benefit: Once per encounter, make a melee attack then move your speed away without provoking attacks of opportunity.

name: Sniping Assassin
benefit: When making a ranged attack not at point-blank range, add half your class level to damage.

name: Sniping Marksman
benefit: Once per encounter when making a ranged attack not at point-blank range, ignore the target's armor bonus to Reflex Defense.

name: Sniping Master
benefit: Aim with one swift action at a target not in point-blank range.

name: Deadly Repercussions
benefit: When you reduce an opponent to 0 hp, all opponents in line of sight of you and the target take -2 attack until your next turn.

name: Manipulating Strike
benefit: Once per turn, when you damage a target with a non-area attack, make Persuasion vs Will Defense to control that target's swift action.

name: Improved Manipulating Strike
benefit: Once per turn, when you damage a target with a non-area attack, make Persuasion vs Will Defense to control that target's move action.

name: Pulling the Strings
benefit: Make Persuasion vs Will Defense within 12 squares to move the target half its speed toward you and make an immediate attack.

name: Hunter's Mark
benefit: When you aim before attacking, if the attack deals damage, move the target one step down the condition track.

name: Hunter's Target
benefit: Once per encounter designate an opponent as your Hunter's Target; damage vs that target increases by an amount tied to your bounty hunter level.

name: Dread
benefit: Make Persuasion vs Will Defense against your Hunter's Target to impose -5 to their Will Defense as long as you keep line of sight.

name: Relentless
benefit: Avoid moving down the condition track from effects caused by your designated opponent.

name: Tag
benefit: If you damage your Hunter's Target, all allies gain +2 on their next attack vs that target until the start of your next turn.

name: Jedi Hunter
benefit: Gain +1 to Fortitude and Will Defense and deal +1 die damage against Force-sensitives.

name: Notorious
benefit: Reroll Persuasion checks to Intimidate.

name: Fearsome
benefit: Opponents with level equal or lower to your heroic level within 6 squares take -1 attack.

name: Ruthless Negotiator
benefit: Reroll Persuasion when haggling over bounty prices.

name: Nowhere to Hide
benefit: Reroll Gather Information checks to locate a specific individual.

name: Nowhere to Run
benefit: Once per turn when your Hunter's Target attempts to withdraw, you may make an attack of opportunity.

name: Signature Item
benefit: With a specific item, gain +2 on opposed skill checks; multiple items stack +1 each.

name: Force Blank
benefit: Use the Force to reduce by 10 the effectiveness of Sense Surroundings attempts to detect you.

name: Lightsaber Evasion
benefit: When an enemy misses you with a lightsaber, you may move 2 squares without provoking attacks of opportunity.

name: Precision Fire
benefit: When you aim, increase the difficulty for your attack to be deflected by +5.

name: Steel Mind
benefit: If you resist a mind-affecting Force power, the user cannot use that same power against you again.

name: Strong-Willed
benefit: Add your class level to Will Defense against Use the Force effects.

name: Telekinetic Resistance
benefit: If you are moved by a Force power, reduce the movement distance by half.

name: Findsman Ceremonies
benefit: Once per day, spend a Force Point for a 10-minute ritual to reroll Perception, Stealth, Farseeing, or an attack roll and regain unspent Force Points.

name: Findsman's Foresight
benefit: Roll two dice for Perception to avoid surprise and keep the better result.

name: Omens
benefit: When an ally within 10 squares and line of sight rolls a natural 1 or 20, you gain +2 attack or +2 Reflex Defense until the end of your next turn.

name: Target Visions
benefit: Once per encounter when an enemy moves within 6 squares, you may make an attack against them as a reaction.

name: Temporal Awareness
benefit: Once per encounter when attacked, you can move your speed as an immediate reaction.

name: Cunning Distraction
benefit: If you feint in combat, you may move half your speed as part of the feint.

name: Damaging Deception
benefit: After a successful Deception vs Will Defense in line of sight, the next attack by your ally against that target deals +2 dice of damage.

name: Distracting Shout
benefit: Once per encounter when an ally is attacked, your Deception check can substitute for their defense; if it fails, the effect is not used.

name: Innocuous
benefit: Make Deception vs Will Defense within 6 squares and line of sight to impose -5 attack vs you until the start of their next turn.

name: Improved Soft Cover
benefit: If adjacent to a creature, gain +2 Reflex Defense until you are no longer adjacent or until your next turn.

name: Treacherous
benefit: If not adjacent to an attacker and you attack another adjacent target and then move 1 square, you may provoke an attack of opportunity from the attacked creature.

name: Competitive Drive
benefit: Once per encounter reroll one Wisdom, Intelligence, or Charisma-based skill check (except Use the Force).

name: Competitive Edge
benefit: When you and allies are not surprised, number of allies equal to your Charisma modifier benefit from Quick Draw.

name: Impose Hesitation
benefit: Make a Persuasion cone (6 squares) vs Will; targets lose their swift action on their next turn and cannot take a full-round action.

name: Corporate Clout
benefit: Once per encounter, Persuasion vs Will within line of sight can prevent the target from attacking you; if over by 5, they also cannot attack your allies.

name: Impose Confusion
benefit: Once per encounter, Persuasion in a 12-square cone vs Will forces targets to lose their swift action and a standard action; one target loses a standard action if failed.

name: Willful Resolve
benefit: Once per encounter negate the effect of a single attack or skill check made vs your Will Defense.

name: Wrong Decision
benefit: Each time you are attacked, the opponent takes -2 to Will Defense until the end of their next turn.

name: Inspire Fear I
benefit: Opponents of equal or lower level take -1 on attack rolls, opposed skill checks, and Use the Force.

name: Frighten
benefit: Once per encounter force all enemies to move 1 square away from one minion; they cannot make attacks of opportunity.

name: Terrify
benefit: Persuasion vs Will in line of sight forces targets to move away from you; if they cannot move, fear effect doubles.

name: Inspire Fear II
benefit: Increase penalties to -2 on affected rolls.

name: Fear Me
benefit: Once per encounter if a minion is down the track, you may reduce them by 1 and the target regains hit points equal to your heroic level unless at 0 hp.

name: Inspire Fear III
benefit: Increase penalties to -5 on affected rolls.

name: Unsavory Reputation
benefit: When an opponent is reduced to half hit points within 6 squares of you, they take -2 to attack and skill checks for the rest of the encounter.

name: Notorious (Infamy)
benefit: Reroll Persuasion checks when attempting to Intimidate.

name: Shared Notoriety
benefit: Your minions may reroll Persuasion checks to Intimidate.

name: Attract Minion
benefit: Attract nonheroic minions with levels equal to 3/4 your level; may have multiple minions.

name: Bodyguard I
benefit: Once per turn, redirect an attack to an attracted minion.

name: Bodyguard II
benefit: Once per turn, redirect an attack to an attracted minion; the minion gains Reflex Defense equal to half your class level.

name: Bodyguard III
benefit: Once per turn, redirect an attack to an attracted minion; the minion gains Reflex Defense equal to your class level and makes a free attack against the attacker.

name: Shelter
benefit: Any cover bonus to your Reflex Defense is +2 when adjacent to a minion.

name: Wealth of Allies
benefit: If a minion is killed, they are replaced by one of the same level after 24 hours.

name: Impel Ally I
benefit: Designate an ally to move immediately at normal speed; must move immediately or the effect is wasted; usable three times per turn.

name: Impel Ally II
benefit: Designated ally can make a standard or move action immediately or the effect is wasted.

name: Impel Ally III
benefit: Designated ally can take a standard and a move action immediately or the effect is wasted.

name: Inspire Wrath
benefit: Allies in line of sight gain +2 attack and +2 to skill checks against your designated target.

name: Urgency
benefit: Once per encounter, increase the speed of allies in line of sight by 2.

name: Tactical Superiority
benefit: Any cover bonus to your Reflex Defense is +2 when adjacent to a minion.

name: Tactical Withdrawal
benefit: All allies in line of sight and within 6 squares may withdraw as a swift action until the start of your next turn.

name: Extended Critical Range (heavy)
benefit: Increase critical range of heavy weapons by 1.

name: Extended Critical Range (rifles)
benefit: Increase critical range of rifles by 1.

name: Flurry Attack
benefit: When you score a critical hit, make an additional attack against a target in range once per turn.

name: Knockback
benefit: On a critical hit, move the opponent back 1 square if not grabbed or into an obstacle; effect applies within two size categories.

name: Reduce Defense
benefit: On a critical hit, target suffers -2 Reflex Defense until healed to full hit points.

name: Reduce Mobility
benefit: On a critical hit, target’s speed is halved until healed to full hit points.

name: Deny Move
benefit: On a critical hit, target cannot move on its next turn.

name: Teras Kasi Basics
benefit: With Teras Kasi basics, unarmed attacks deal an additional damage die.

name: Ignore Damage Reduction
benefit: If your damage exceeds a creature's DR, you ignore that DR for that attack.

name: Teras Kasi Mastery
prerequisites: Martial Arts I-III, Teras Kasi Basics
benefit: Only full-round unarmed actions allowed; take full attack as a standard action.

name: Unarmed Parry
prerequisites: Martial Arts I-II, Teras Kasi Basics
benefit: When fighting defensively, may negate a melee attack using parry; if successful and attack beats your melee attack, negate the attack and apply -2 cumulative attack vs others.

name: Unarmed Counterstrike
benefit: If you parry a melee attack, immediately make an unarmed attack as a reaction against the attacker.

name: Accurate Blow
benefit: If you exceed Reflex Defense by 5 or more with a melee attack, deal +1 damage die per melee weapon group.

name: Close-Quarters Fighter
benefit: If adjacent or in the same square as a foe, gain +1 melee attack.

name: Ignore Armor
benefit: Once per encounter, ignore a target’s armor or equipment bonuses with a melee attack.

name: Improved Stunning Strike
benefit: If you move an opponent down the condition track with a melee attack, that target cannot take a standard or full-round action on its next turn.

name: Whirling Death
benefit: When using Unrelenting Assault, every adjacent target takes damage equal to your Strength bonus with a melee weapon.

name: Bodyguard's Sacrifice
benefit: Take any or all damage that would target an adjacent ally; cannot use again until the end of your next turn.

name: Take the Hit
benefit: If you take damage for an ally, your damage threshold is +5.

name: Roll With It
benefit: If you take damage for an ally, gain Damage Reduction equal to your class level until the end of your next turn.

name: Lifesaver
benefit: Once per encounter, when an adjacent ally is reduced to 0 hp or below threshold, you may move your speed to become adjacent and take the damage instead.

name: Out of Harm's Way
benefit: Allow one ally within 6 squares to move their speed to become adjacent to you without provoking attacks of opportunity.

name: Ward
benefit: Provide soft cover to one adjacent ally.

name: Armored Guard
benefit: When using Ward, add one-half your armor bonuses to the ally’s Reflex Defense.

name: Guard's Endurance
benefit: Whenever you begin your turn adjacent to the Ward target, gain hit points equal to your character level.

name: Controlled Burst
benefit: Reduce autofire or burst-fire penalty by 2; if braced, no penalty.

name: Exotic Weapon Mastery
benefit: Become proficient with any exotic weapon feat even if you do not possess the feat.

name: Greater Weapon Focus
prerequisites: Weapon Focus with a proficient weapon
benefit: Gain +1 attack with the chosen weapon.

name: Greater Devastating Attack
benefit: With the chosen proficient weapon, reduce target's damage threshold by 10 (replaces Devastating Attack).

name: Greater Penetrating Attack
benefit: With chosen proficient weapon, reduce opponent's DR by 10 (replaces Penetrating Attack).

name: Greater Weapon Specialization
benefit: Gain +2 damage with the chosen proficient weapon.

name: Multiattack Proficiency (heavy)
benefit: Reduce multiattack penalty by 2 for heavy weapons.

name: Multiattack Proficiency (rifles)
benefit: Reduce multiattack penalty by 2 for rifles.

name: Mandalorian Advance
benefit: Once per encounter on your turn, move your speed as a free action before taking other actions.

name: Mandalorian Ferocity
benefit: Once per encounter when making more than one attack, add one damage die for each successful hit.

name: Mandalorian Glory
benefit: Once per encounter when you reduce an opponent to 0 hp, gain +5 attack on your next attack in the same encounter.

name: Armored Mandalorian
benefit: Add your armor's Fortitude Defense bonus to Elite Trooper Damage Reduction; lightsabers that do not ignore DR still do not ignore this DR.

name: Ambush (Republic Commando)
benefit: If you hit an opponent that has not yet acted, add +2 dice of damage.

name: Higher Yield
benefit: Once per encounter, add +1 damage die to a grenade or explosive.

name: Rapid Reload
benefit: Retrieve and load an energy cell or power pack as a single swift action.

name: Shoulder to Shoulder
benefit: If you begin your turn adjacent to an ally, gain hit points equal to your heroic level.

name: Strength in Numbers
benefit: If within 10 squares of an ally, gain +2 Damage Reduction.

name: Weapon Shift
benefit: When using a ranged weapon as a melee weapon, gain +2 melee attack.

name: Cover Bracing
benefit: Brace an autofire weapon as a swift action when near cover to gain bracing benefits.

name: Intentional Crash
benefit: On a successful ram as a pilot, you take half the ram damage; if target is same size or smaller, it cannot move next round.

name: Nonlethal Tactics
benefit: With a stun weapon, gain +1 attack and +1 damage die (nonlethal).

name: Pursuit
benefit: Not restricted to a straight line when running; may reroll Endurance checks.

name: Respected Officer
benefit: Automatically improve the attitude of an indifferent NPC to friendly with no check required.

name: Slowing Stun
benefit: When you move a target -1 down the condition track, their speed is halved until the condition is removed.

name: Takedown
benefit: When you deal damage at the end of a charge, you knock the target prone if no more than one size larger than you.

name: Charm Beast
benefit: Use the Force in place of Persuasion against animals with Intelligence 2 or less; -5 if the animal does not understand you.

name: Bonded Mount
benefit: Your bonded mount shares an empathic link, uses your Reflex and Will Defense while you ride it, and you gain the mount’s senses.

name: Entreat Beast
benefit: Use the Force vs Will Defense of an indifferent or better beast to command a minor task within 30 squares.

name: Soothing Presence
benefit: Automatically shift an unfriendly beast to indifferent.

name: Wild Sense
benefit: Once per turn, touch the mind of an indifferent or better beast within 12 squares and line of sight to use the beast’s Perception and line of sight as your own.

name: Channel Aggression
benefit: Against a flanked opponent or one denied Dexterity to Defense, deal extra damage equal to 1d6 per class level (maximum 10d6).

name: Channel Anger
benefit: Gain +2 melee attack and damage for a number of rounds equal to 5 + Constitution modifier, then move down one step on the condition track.

name: Embrace Dark Side
benefit: Reroll Dark Side skills and Use the Force checks; afterwards you can no longer use light-side talents.

name: Crippling Strike
benefit: On a critical hit, you can reduce the target’s speed by half until fully healed.

name: Dark Side Talisman
benefit: Gain +2 to one Defense against light-side powers.

name: Greater Dark Side Talisman
benefit: Gain +2 to all Defenses against light-side powers.

name: Force Power Adept
benefit: Choose a Force power; you may reroll Use the Force checks for that power.

name: Force Treatment
benefit: Use the Force replaces Treat Injury; you can treat without a medkit or medpac and are considered trained.

name: Fortified Body
benefit: Immune to disease, poison, and radiation.

name: Attune Weapon
benefit: Grant a melee weapon +1 attack.

name: Empower Weapon
benefit: Add one damage die to the empowered weapon.

name: Force Throw
benefit: If within 6 squares, pull the weapon back as a swift action with a DC 20 Use the Force check.

name: Primitive Block
benefit: Negate a melee attack with a Use the Force check vs the attack roll; -5 each additional use in a round; must have empowered weapon active, be aware and not flat-footed; may spend a Force Point for adjacent character.

name: Force Talisman
benefit: Grant +1 to one Defense; cannot reattune for 24 hours; only one talisman active at a time.

name: Focused Force Talisman
benefit: Select a single Force power; when using that power and spending a Force Point, return all spent uses of that power to your suite.

name: Greater Focused Force Talisman
benefit: As Focused Force Talisman but the Force Point does not count toward the one-per-turn limit.

name: Greater Force Talisman
benefit: Grant +1 to all Defenses.

name: Force Interrogation
benefit: When you damage an opponent with a Force power, make a Persuasion check to intimidate.

name: Cower Enemies
benefit: Persuasion in a 6-square cone to intimidate multiple targets instead of single target.

name: Unsettling Presence
benefit: Use the Force vs Will against all in 6 squares; affected creatures take -2 to attack and skill checks until end of encounter.

name: Inquisition
benefit: +1 attack rolls and +1 die damage against Force-sensitives.

name: Channel Vitality
benefit: Move -1 down the condition track to gain 1 Force Point until the end of your turn.

name: Closed Mind
benefit: Mind-affecting effects against you are rolled twice and you take the lower result.

name: Esoteric Technique
benefit: When you spend a Force Point to activate a technique or secret, you gain hit points equal to 10 + class level.

name: Mystic Mastery
benefit: When you gain a level, gain bonus Force Points equal to number of Force Talents you possess (maximum 6).

name: Regimen Aptitude
benefit: Gain +5 on skill checks made to perform a Force Regimen.

name: Mind Probe
benefit: Touch a creature with Int 3+; Use the Force vs Will to probe its mind as Gather Information if unwilling.

name: Perfect Telepathy
benefit: You can communicate in full sentences and complete thoughts telepathically without altering the subject.

name: Psychic Citadel
benefit: Gain Will Defense bonus equal to your class level.

name: Psychic Defenses
benefit: When targeted by mind-affecting powers, they automatically take damage equal to 1d6 × your Wisdom modifier (minimum ×1).

name: Telepathic Intruder
benefit: If you successfully use a mind-affecting power on a target, gain +2 on future mind-affecting powers against that target.

name: Brutal Attack
benefit: If you deal damage over the threshold, add +1 damage die.

name: Distracting Attack
benefit: If you deal damage, compare your attack to the target's Will Defense; if you meet or exceed it, the target takes -2 Reflex Defense until end of your turn.

name: Exotic Weapons Master
benefit: Treat all exotic weapons as a single weapon group for proficiency and related effects.

name: Lockdown Strike
benefit: When you hit a moving opponent one size larger or smaller with an attack of opportunity, end their movement.

name: Multiattack Proficiency (exotic)
benefit: Reduce multiattack penalty by 2 for exotic weapons.

name: Personal Vendetta
benefit: Taunt enemies within 12 squares and line of sight; they suffer -2 attack on targets that are not you.

name: Call Out
benefit: As Personal Vendetta but designate one opponent to take -5 attack.

name: Unstoppable
benefit: Once per encounter, reduce an effect that would move you down the condition track by 1 step.

name: Blowback
benefit: If you exceed the target's threshold, push the target 1 square.

name: Close Contact
benefit: Point-blank range increased by 5 squares; short range begins 5 squares later but ends at the same distance.

name: Multiattack Proficiency (rifles)
benefit: Reduce multiattack penalty by 2 for rifles.

name: Old Faithful
benefit: Your trusty sidearm bonus also applies to any rifle or carbine.

name: Opportunity Fire
benefit: +2 on attacks of opportunity with rifles.

name: Rifle Master
benefit: Treat rifles as accurate weapons and take no penalty firing at short range.

name: Shoot from the Hip
benefit: You can always use rifles to make attacks of opportunity.

name: Snap Shot
benefit: Aiming with stock extended does not provoke attacks of opportunity.

name: Blind Shot
benefit: Ignore penalties from concealment and total concealment when making attacks.

name: Debilitating Shot
benefit: When you aim before attacking and deal damage, move the target one step down the condition track.

name: Deceptive Shot
benefit: Target in line of sight within 6 squares; Deception vs Will imposes loss of Dexterity to Defense until next turn.

name: Improved Quick Draw
benefit: May make attacks in the surprise round.

name: Knockdown Shot
benefit: When you aim before attacking and succeed, knock the target prone (target no larger than two size categories).

name: Mobile Attack (pistols)
benefit: Immediately after making a full attack with two pistols, you may move your speed as a free action.

name: Multiattack Proficiency (pistols)
benefit: Reduce multiattack penalty by 2 for pistols.

name: Ranged Disarm
benefit: Disarm a target with a ranged weapon; does not provoke attacks of opportunity.

name: Ranged Flank
benefit: If within 6 squares of the target, you can count as adjacent for flanking against a single target.

name: Trigger Work
