benefit: No penalty to attack when using Rapid Shot.

name: Dash and Blast
prerequisites: Dual Weapon Mastery I, Running Attack
benefit: Once per encounter with two pistols, move twice your speed and make attacks with each pistol.

name: Flanking Foe
benefit: If flanked and wielding two pistols, make flanking attacks as a standard action instead of a full; must attack two targets.

name: Guaranteed Shot
benefit: With two pistols, even if you miss, deal damage equal to half your heroic level.

name: Hailfire
benefit: With two pistols, attack as if autofire even without autofire, applying autofire penalties.

name: Twin Shot
prerequisites: Dual Weapon Mastery I, Rapid Shot
benefit: With two pistols and Rapid Shot, gain +2 damage.

name: Armored Augmentation I
benefit: Once per encounter, as an action, add your armor bonus to Reflex Defense for threshold until end of encounter.

name: Armored Augmentation II
benefit: Also gain Damage Reduction equal to twice your armor's equipment bonus to Fortitude Defense.

name: Armor Mastery
benefit: Reflex Defense bonus equals heroic level + half armor bonus or armor bonus; counts as Armored and Improved Armored Defense.

name: Cortosis Defense
benefit: +2 on opposed unarmed melee attack rolls versus lightsabers.

name: Cortosis Retaliation
benefit: When you successfully parry a lightsaber attack, you may make an immediate attack against that attacker.

name: Knight's Morale
benefit: When an ally within 12 squares hits with a lightsaber, you gain +1 to all Defenses until the end of your next turn.

name: Strength of the Empire
benefit: When an ally within 12 squares hits with a lightsaber, deal +1 damage die on your next lightsaber attack.

name: Oath of Duty
benefit: When an ally within 12 squares hits with a lightsaber, you gain hit points equal to 3 × class level.

name: Praetoria Ishu
benefit: May use Block and Deflect to protect an adjacent ally.

name: Praetoria Vonil
benefit: With a lightsaber in two hands, if you move at least 1 square before your attack, add +1 damage die.

name: Black Market Buyer
benefit: Automatically locate a black market merchant.

name: Only the Finest
benefit: Obtain modified items without increasing their base value.

name: Excellent Kit
benefit: All gear you purchase has +50% hit points, +5 Damage Reduction, and you gain +2 on Mechanics checks with those objects.

name: Just What Is Needed
benefit: When using Repair or Mechanics, retemplates/apps/store an additional +1d8 hit points.

name: Right Gear for the Job
benefit: +5 equipment bonus to an ally's untrained check and treat the ally as trained (not for Use the Force).

name: Capture Droid
benefit: Once per encounter against an adjacent droid reduced to 0 hp, Mechanics vs Will Defense to capture: target moves +2 up the track, gains d8 hp and becomes friendly.

name: Improved Jury-Rig
benefit: Jury-rig as a standard action instead of full; no check required to jury-rig; move the vehicle +3 steps up track instead of +2.

name: Improvised Device
benefit: With DC 25 Mechanics and 1 hour, create an item worth 200 × class level credits; item cannot be rare or illegal, destroyed after 24 hours, usable once per day.

name: Bigger Bang
benefit: Improvised Device deals +1 damage die.

name: Custom Model
benefit: Add one modification from Tech Specialist to an Improvised Device without affecting the item's value.

name: Always Ready
benefit: When a readied action is triggered, your Initiative does not change.

name: Concealed Weapon Expert
benefit: Once per round with unarmed, hold-out, dagger, or vibrodagger, reroll an attack.

name: Creeping Approach
benefit: Designate an unaware target within 12 squares; until your next turn that target cannot make Perception checks against you.

name: Set for Stun
benefit: If stun damage exceeds the threshold, the target moves -3 on the condition track instead of -2.

name: Silent Takedown
benefit: If you damage an unaware target with Stealth, the target cannot speak or make noise until the end of your next turn.

name: Spynet Agent
benefit: Gain Bothan Spynet benefits plus two talents from Infiltration; Gather Information replaces Knowledge (galactic lore) and is considered trained.

name: Bothan Resources
benefit: With DC 20 Gather Information you can purchase standard equipment at 50% cost or exotic items at 75% cost.

name: Knowledge is Life
benefit: With Knowledge (galactic lore) DC 15 + target level, gain +2 to one defense vs that target.

name: Knowledge is Power
benefit: With Knowledge (galactic lore) DC 15 + target level, gain +1 critical range vs that target.

name: Knowledge is Strength
benefit: With Knowledge (galactic lore) DC 15 + target level, gain a bonus to attacks vs that target.

name: Six Questions
benefit: With Knowledge (galactic lore) DC 15 + target level, learn the target’s level, classes, abilities, and Force/Destiny points.

name: Force Fortification
benefit: Negate critical hits and take normal damage instead.

name: Greater Weapon Focus (lightsabers)
benefit: Gain an additional +1 attack with lightsabers.

name: Greater Weapon Specialization (lightsabers)
benefit: Gain +2 damage with lightsabers.

name: Improved Lightsaber Throw
benefit: Make a single ranged attack with a thrown lightsaber comparing to Reflex of all targets in a 6-square line; on miss target takes half; DC 20 to return.

name: Thrown Lightsaber Mastery
benefit: Targets struck by a thrown lightsaber move at half speed (round down) until your next turn.

name: Improved Riposte
benefit: When you make a riposte, you do not count the initial block penalty.

name: Improved Redirect
benefit: Once per turn when you redirect an attack, do not count the initial deflect penalty.

name: Lightsaber Form Savant
benefit: Once per encounter, return one lightsaber form to your suite without spending a Force Point.

name: Multiattack Proficiency (lightsabers)
benefit: Reduce multiattack penalties with lightsabers by 2; may be taken multiple times.

name: Severing Strike
benefit: If you deal damage exceeding current HP and threshold, deal half damage and sever (special effect) while moving down the track.

name: Shoto Master
benefit: One-handed lightsabers are treated as light for shoto; may activate Lightsaber Defense as a free action with a shoto.

name: Direct
benefit: Return one Force power to any ally within 6 squares and line of sight (one ally’s spent use).

name: Impart Knowledge
benefit: Aid on Knowledge checks for an ally within 6 squares if you are trained in that Knowledge.

name: Insight of the Force
benefit: Use the Force replaces Knowledge when untrained and is treated as trained.

name: Master Advisor
benefit: An ally you aid with Skilled Advisor gains a Force Point to spend before the end of the encounter.

name: Scholarly Knowledge
benefit: Reroll Knowledge checks when you are trained in that Knowledge.

name: Call Weapon
benefit: Call and ignite a lightsaber you built as a free action if it is within line of sight.

name: Masterwork Lightsaber
benefit: Add one extra accessory to a lightsaber you built; reroll one damage die if you built it; mentoring another reduces their DC by 5.

name: Lightsaber Specialist
benefit: Gain +2 to Block and Deflect with a lightsaber you built.

name: Perfect Attunement
benefit: If you spend a Force Point on a lightsaber attack with a lightsaber you built, add that amount to damage.

name: Quick Modification
benefit: Spend 1 minute to remove an accessory and add another to a lightsaber you built.

name: Jedi Battle Commander
benefit: Your Battle Meditation grants +2 to attack instead of +1.

name: Defensive Circle
prerequisites: Block or Deflect, Jedi Battle Commander
benefit: You and allies affected by Battle Meditation gain +2 Reflex Defense; you gain +1 on Use the Force to Block/Deflect for each adjacent ally.

name: Force Revive
benefit: An ally affected by Battle Meditation reduced to 0 hp may take Second Wind as a reaction and falls unconscious.

name: Slashing Charge
benefit: Once per encounter when you charge with lightsabers, ignore the Use the Force penalty on Block for the charge; applies to Riposte.

name: Mobile Attack (lightsabers)
prerequisites: Multiattack Proficiency (lightsabers), Dual Weapon Mastery I, Weapon Focus (lightsabers)
benefit: After a full attack with two lightsabers, may move your speed as a free action.

name: Force Treatment
benefit: Use the Force replaces Treat Injury; can treat without a medkit or medpac and is considered trained.

name: Healing Boost
benefit: Damage healed with Vital Transfer increases by 1 point per class level.

name: Improved Healing Boost
benefit: Healing Boost increases damage healed by 2 points per class level.

name: Soothe
benefit: Use Vital Transfer to move a target +1 up the condition track instead of healing; you move -1 down the track.

name: Apprentice Boon
benefit: Add your Force Point result to an ally within 12 squares whose Use the Force modifier is lower than yours.

name: Share Force Secret
benefit: Once per turn, grant use of a Force Secret to an ally within 12 squares who is trained in Use the Force.

name: Share Force Technique
benefit: Once per turn, grant use of a Force Technique to an ally within 12 squares who is trained in Use the Force; not for Force Point recovery.

name: Share Talent
benefit: Once per day, grant use of a Lightsaber Combat tree, Duelist, or Forms talent to allies within 12 squares equal to half your class level for the encounter.

name: Transfer Power
benefit: Spend a power from your suite and give it to an ally trained in Use the Force within 12 squares and line of sight; lost if unused by end of encounter.

name: Echoes in the Force
benefit: Use Farseeing on a location to view the past; DC 20 plus one per day into the past.

name: Jedi Quarry
benefit: Gain +2 speed if you end your movement adjacent to your target.

name: Prepared for Danger
benefit: Spend a remaining Farseeing power to regain any other expended Force power.

name: Sense Deception
benefit: Use the Force replaces Will Defense against Deception or Persuasion.

name: Unclouded Judgment
benefit: Spend a Force Point to automatically negate a mind-affecting Force power or talent.

name: Cover Your Tracks
benefit: Gather Information checks to find you suffer a -5 penalty.

name: Difficult to Sense
benefit: Reroll opposed Use the Force checks to conceal your presence.

name: Force Veil
benefit: The detection radius for you is 10 km instead of 100 km.

name: Jedi Network
benefit: Includes Acquire Equipment or Funds, Obtain Info, Receive Medical Attention, and Secure Safe House benefits.

name: Dark Deception
benefit: When opponents attempt to sense you with Use the Force, you may act as if your Dark Side equals your Wisdom; Deception is a class skill.

name: Taint of the Dark Side
benefit: Add one dark side Force power to your suite; once per encounter use it without increasing your Dark Side score.

name: Improved Sentinel Strike
benefit: Increase Sentinel Strike damage die to d8 instead of d6.

name: Improved Sentinel's Gambit
benefit: You may use Sentinel's Gambit additional times per encounter equal to half your class level.

name: Rebuke the Dark
benefit: When targeted by a dark side power, roll two dice for rebuke attempt and take the better result.

name: Force Warning
benefit: Allies within 12 squares may reroll Initiative; if allies are surprised but not you, prevent surprise for up to one ally per your Wisdom modifier.

name: Watchman's Advance
benefit: When acting in the surprise round, you and allies gain +1 move maximum.

name: Improved Quick Draw (lightsabers)
benefit: Draw, ignite, and attack with a lightsaber even if surprised; may draw and ignite as a free action.

name: Sheltering Stance
benefit: May use Block or Deflect to protect an adjacent ally without spending a Force Point.

name: Vigilance
benefit: Grant one adjacent ally +1 Reflex Defense while they remain adjacent.

name: Combat Trance
benefit: Battle Strike applies to your first attack each round until the end of the encounter.

name: Improvised Weapon Master
benefit: No penalty when using improvised weapons.

name: Twin Weapon Style
benefit: You can attack with both weapons or a double-sided weapon against different targets.

name: Twin Weapon Mastery
benefit: You may move 2 squares between attacks without provoking attacks of opportunity.

name: Shoto Pin Block
benefit: When you Block with a shoto, the attacker cannot make a melee attack until its next turn or until you are no longer adjacent.

name: Ataru
benefit: May apply Dexterity modifier to damage or double Dexterity bonus if two-handed instead of Strength.

name: Djem So
benefit: Once per round, if hit in melee, make an immediate attack against that opponent.

name: Juyo
benefit: Once per encounter against a single enemy in line of sight, reroll your first attack roll and keep the best.

name: Vaapad
benefit: Critical range extends to 19–20 and 19 is not an automatic hit.

name: Makashi
benefit: Increase Lightsaber Defense bonus by +2 (maximum +5).

name: Niman
benefit: +1 Reflex and +1 Will Defense while wielding a lightsaber.

name: Jar'Kai
benefit: Apply Lightsaber Defense twice when wielding two lightsabers.

name: Shien
benefit: +5 on ranged attack rolls for deflected shots.

name: Shii-Cho
benefit: Take only a -2 penalty on Use the Force checks for each Block or Deflect made last turn.

name: Sokan
benefit: Take 10 on Acrobatics checks to tumble even when distracted; each occupied square counts as 1.

name: Soresu
benefit: Reroll Use the Force checks for Block and Deflect.

name: Trakata
benefit: Use Deception to feint and shut off and reignite lightsaber as part of form actions.

name: Bloodthirsty
benefit: Perform coup de grace as a move action; if you kill with a coup de grace all allies in line of sight gain +2 attack for the encounter.

name: Fight to the Death
benefit: Once per encounter, all allies within 6 squares heal hit points equal to your heroic level.

name: Savage Reputation
benefit: All opponents within 6 squares take -1 attack.

name: Keep Them Reeling (Piracy)
benefit: Make a single melee attack within reach; if it hits deal no damage but force the target to move or withdraw next turn.

name: Raider's Frenzy
benefit: Once per round, if you or an ally within 6 squares damage a target, allies in line of sight deal additional damage equal to half your class level to that target.

name: Raider's Surge
benefit: Once per encounter, Deception or Persuasion vs Will in line of sight forces the target to withdraw or suffer -1 attack until end of encounter.

name: Take Them Alive
benefit: If you or allies within 6 squares reduce an enemy to 0 hp, you may instead render them stunned.

name: Armored Spacer
benefit: Treat armor proficiency as Armor Proficiency (heavy).

name: Attract Privateer
benefit: Attract nonheroic minions with levels equal to 3/4 your level; may have multiple minions.

name: Blaster and Blade I
prerequisites: Dual Weapon I, Weapon Proficiency (advanced & pistols)
benefit: With a single attack using an advanced melee weapon, make a free pistol attack.

name: Blaster and Blade II
benefit: Treat the advanced melee weapon as if you were holding it two-handed for Strength bonus purposes (double Str bonus).

name: Blaster and Blade III
benefit: When attacking with both weapons, you may make a full attack as a standard action.

name: Boarder
benefit: Ignore cover for character-scale ranged attacks when aboard a starship or space station.

name: Ion Mastery
benefit: With ion weapons, gain +1 attack and +1 damage die.

name: Multiattack Proficiency (advanced melee)
benefit: Reduce multiattack penalties by 2 for advanced melee weapons.

name: Preserving Shot
benefit: Instead of destroying a vehicle, you can disable it so it cannot move.

name: Bring Them Back
benefit: Revive a target that died within a number of rounds equal to half your heroic level.

name: Emergency Team
benefit: Allies automatically succeed at aid another for medical tasks.

name: Extra First Aid
benefit: You can perform first aid one additional time per day on a target.

name: Medical Miracle
benefit: DC 20 Treat Injury on an adjacent target lets them take a Second Wind even if above half hit points.

name: Natural Healing
benefit: You may make Treat Injury checks using natural substitutes without a medical kit.

name: Steady Under Pressure
benefit: Reroll Treat Injury checks.

name: Battlefield Medic
benefit: Perform first aid as a standard action instead of a full-round action.

name: Second Chance
benefit: If you fail a Treat Injury check, the patient does not take any additional damage from the failed attempt.

name: Advantageous Strike
benefit: Gain +5 attack on attacks of opportunity made with melee weapons.

name: Dirty Tricks
benefit: Use Deception to feint as a two-swift action against an opponent you threaten.

name: Dual Weapon Flourish I
prerequisites: Dual Weapon Mastery I, Weapon Finesse
benefit: With two light melee weapons or two lightsabers, when you make a full attack with one weapon you gain a free attack with the other.

name: Master of Elegance
prerequisites: Dual or Single Weapon Flourish I
benefit: Add Dexterity to melee damage with light melee weapons; double Dexterity bonus if wielding two-handed.

name: Dual Weapon Flourish II
prerequisites: Dual Weapon Mastery II, Dual Weapon Flourish I, Master of Elegance
benefit: With two light melee weapons or two lightsabers, you may make a full attack as a standard action when using both weapons (once per turn).

name: Multiattack Proficiency (advanced melee)
benefit: Reduce multiattack penalty by 2 for advanced melee weapons.

name: Out of Nowhere
benefit: Once per encounter, after a successful feint you may make an attack with a light melee weapon or lightsaber.

name: Single Weapon Flourish I
benefit: With one light melee weapon or lightsaber, you can move your speed as a free action.

name: Single Weapon Flourish II
prerequisites: Master of Elegance, Single Weapon Flourish I
benefit: With one light melee weapon or lightsaber, you may make a full attack as a standard action (once per turn).

name: Breach Cover
benefit: Ignore cover when firing or throwing a weapon with burst or splash.

name: Breaching Explosive
benefit: Ignore door and wall thresholds when using mines and non-grenade explosives.

name: Prepared Explosive
benefit: A non-grenade explosive you set can turn normal terrain into difficult and difficult into normal.

name: Problem Solver
benefit: Once per turn, one vehicle in your line of sight that can hear you ignores difficult terrain and gains +5 Pilot to avoid hazards.

name: Repairs on the Fly
benefit: Repair as a standard action once per day per droid, object, or vehicle.

name: Quick Modifications
prerequisites: Tech Specialist, Repairs on the Fly
benefit: When creating a field-created weapon, add one modification at creation.

name: Droid Expert
benefit: Repair droids gain +1 hp for every point your Mechanics check exceeds DC 20.

name: Sabotage Device
benefit: Sabotage an object with an energy cell/power pack to turn it into a grenade; can be retemplates/apps/stored with a swift action.

name: Tech Savant
benefit: Trained in Knowledge (technology); increase speed of a droid or vehicle by 1 square if you occupy or are adjacent to it (once per round).

name: Vehicular Boost
benefit: DC 15 Mechanics check to add hit points to a vehicle equal to 5 × class level.

name: Assault Tactics
benefit: DC 15 Tactics check designate a single object or creature; allies who can hear you deal extra d6 damage until your next turn.

name: Exploit Weakness
benefit: When you use Assault Tactics, the target takes a cumulative -1 Reflex each time it is damaged (max -5).

name: Deployment Tactics
benefit: DC 15 Tactics check: allies gain +1 attack vs flanked targets or +1 Defense vs attacks of opportunity next turn; synergizes with Born Leader/Battle Analysis for +2.

name: Field Tactics
benefit: Allies within 10 squares gain a +10 cover bonus if they are in cover until your next turn.

name: Outmaneuver
benefit: Enemies in line of sight lose competence/insight/morale/dodge bonuses to Reflex Defense; opposed check to resist.

name: One for the Team
benefit: You may take half or all damage for an adjacent ally; an ally may take the same for you.

name: Grand Leader
benefit: Once per encounter, grant hit points equal to 5 + half your class level to all allies within 20 squares and line of sight.

name: Shift Defense I
benefit: Redistribute defenses: -2 to one Defense to add +1 to another Defense.

name: Shift Defense II
benefit: Redistribute defenses: -5 to one Defense to add +2 to another Defense.

name: Shift Defense III
benefit: Redistribute defenses: -5 to two Defenses to add +5 to another Defense.

name: Tactical Edge
benefit: Use Assault, Deployment, or Field Tactics as a swift action instead of a standard action.

name: Uncanny Defense
benefit: Once per day add half your officer class level to all Defenses for 1 round; must declare at start of your turn.

name: Combined Fire (Naval)
benefit: Designate a single vehicle, object, or creature in line of sight; gain extra damage dice for batteries (scaling every 2 batteries) and may designate one weapon or battery to make a single attack.

name: Fleet Deployment
benefit: A number of vehicles equal to your class level in line of sight may each move a number of squares equal to their speed.

name: Fleet Tactics
benefit: Designate a single vehicle; allied gunners in line of sight gain +1 damage die.

name: It's a Trap
benefit: Once per encounter set a trap for a single vehicle in line of sight that activates on that vehicle's immediate move action.

name: Legendary Commander
benefit: Gunners on your ship add half your heroic level (or half their HL) to damage and treat crew as one level higher; calculate capital ship Reflex Defense as your HL + 1/2 armor if higher.

name: Disciplined Trickery
benefit: Once per turn allow one ally within 12 squares to reroll Deception or Stealth.

name: Group Perception
benefit: All allies within 6 squares may roll Perception when you do, taking the highest result.

name: Hasty Withdrawal
benefit: Once per turn a number of allies equal to your Charisma bonus (minimum 1) within 12 squares and line of sight may withdraw as a free action.

name: Stealthy Withdrawal
benefit: An ally using Hasty Withdrawal who ends in cover may make a Stealth check as a free action.

name: Stalwart Subordinates
benefit: An ally within 12 squares and line of sight targeted by an effect forces the enemy to reroll and take the lowest.

name: Stay in the Fight
benefit: Remove one mind-affecting or fear effect from an ally within 12 squares and line of sight and grant them hit points equal to 10 + class level.

name: Recruit Enemy
benefit: Once per encounter, when you deal damage equal to the target’s current hp and threshold, make Persuasion vs Will Defense; on success deal half damage, move target -1 on track, and the target becomes friendly (higher-level targets get +5 on Will).

name: Bolstered Numbers
benefit: If Recruit Enemy succeeds, allies gain +2 attack until end of encounter.

name: Noble Sacrifice
benefit: If a recruited enemy is at 0 hp or bottom of track, you and all allies in line of sight gain hit points equal to 10 + your class level.

name: Stay in the Fight (Recruit)
benefit: A recruited enemy may immediately use Second Wind as a reaction.

name: Team Recruiting
benefit: You can use Recruit Enemy when you or an ally would deal killing damage, not only when you deal it.

name: Preternatural Senses
benefit: Once per encounter add half your class level to one Defense.

name: Seize the Moment
benefit: Once per round when an ally damages an opponent, you may take a swift action as a reaction.

name: Find an Opening
benefit: Forfeit the extra swift action to aim with one swift on your next turn.

name: Double Up
benefit: Once per encounter forgo the extra swift to attack; if you hit and damage with a ranged attack, count your and an ally's attack as one for overcoming DR/SR/Threshold.

name: Uncanny Instincts
benefit: Once per round when damaged, move 1 square as a reaction without provoking attacks of opportunity.

name: Opportunistic Defense
benefit: Once per encounter forgo your extra move to add +5 to one Defense until the end of your next turn.

name: Tangle Up
benefit: If a non-area attack hits, you may choose to do half damage and force the target to lose its next move.

name: Confounding Attack
benefit: Once per encounter forgo your extra move to attack; if you hit and damage with a melee attack, you switch places with the opponent.

name: Bunker Blaster
benefit: If adjacent to an object that provides cover to your target, you may aim at that target as a move action.

name: Enhance Cover
benefit: One ally in line of sight who has cover is treated as having improved cover while they still have cover.

name: Escort Fighter
benefit: When you move one adjacent ally, that ally moves and ends adjacent to you; cannot exceed the ally’s movement.

name: Safe Passage
benefit: Once per turn one ally in line of sight may move its speed as a reaction; if a target makes an attack of opportunity against that ally you may make an attack of opportunity against that target.

name: Safe Zone
benefit: Create a 4×4 square Safe Zone; an ally that starts its turn in the Safe Zone gains +2 Fortitude and +2 Will Defense; Safe Zones cannot overlap another Safe Zone.

name: Defensive Measures
benefit: Enemies treat your Safe Zone as difficult terrain.

name: Launch Point
benefit: Any ally who starts in your Safe Zone and then exits it gains +2 attack.

name: Obscuring Defenses
benefit: Enemies firing into your Safe Zone take a -2 penalty to attack.

name: Relocate
benefit: Dismiss your Safe Zone; allies who were in your old Safe Zone gain +2 speed.

name: Zone of Recuperation
benefit: Any ally who uses Second Wind in your Safe Zone regains additional hit points equal to your class level.

name: Device Jammer
benefit: DC 20 Mechanics vs an item; on success all items of that type within 12 squares cease functioning; affects one device at a time.

name: Droid Jammer
benefit: Mechanics vs a droid’s Will Defense within 6 squares; on success the droid can take only swift actions; affects one droid at a time.

name: Mine Mastery
benefit: Place mines as a standard action instead of a full-round action.

name: Skilled Demolitionist
benefit: Set a detonator as a swift action; explosives do not detonate on a failure by 10 or more.

name: Shaped Explosion
benefit: Create blasts in a line or cone: length = 2× radius; cone length = 3× blast radius; origin from explosive’s square.

name: Extreme Explosion
benefit: Increase blast radius by 1 square.

name: Blaster Turret I
benefit: 1/encounter deploy Tiny turret: Init +4, Perception +4, Reflex Def 10, 10 hp, threshold 8, damage 3d6; must be adjacent to you to operate.

name: Blaster Turret II
benefit: 1/encounter deploy improved Tiny turret: Init +8, Perception +8, Reflex Def 12, 15 hp, threshold 10, damage 3d8; remote range 12 squares.

name: Blaster Turret III
benefit: 1/encounter deploy advanced Tiny turret: Init +8, Perception +8, Reflex Def 12, 15 hp, DR 5, threshold 10, fires twice per activation; remote range 12 squares.

name: Ion Turret
benefit: 1/encounter deploy Tiny ion turret: Init +4, Perception +4, Reflex Def 10, 10 hp, threshold 8, deals 3d6 ion; must be adjacent to you to operate.

name: Stun Turret
benefit: 1/encounter deploy Tiny stun turret: Init +4, Perception +4, Reflex Def 10, 10 hp, threshold 8, deals 3d6 stun; must be adjacent to you to operate.

name: Turret Self-Destruct
benefit: When a turret is reduced to 0 hp it self-destructs in a 2-square radius dealing its normal damage; you may disable it as a reaction if adjacent.

name: Implant (general)
benefit: If not treated, at end of encounter the implanted target moves -3 down the condition track and requires rest or surgery to recover.

name: Adrenaline Implant
benefit: Once per encounter an adjacent ally gains 10 hit points at the start of each of its turns while adjacent (effects do not stack).

name: Precision Implant
benefit: Once per encounter an adjacent ally gains +1 attack.

name: Resilience Implant
benefit: Once per encounter an adjacent ally gains +5 to threshold.

name: Speed Implant
benefit: Once per encounter an adjacent ally gains +2 speed.

name: Strength Implant
benefit: Once per encounter an adjacent ally gains +1 damage die.

name: Biotech Mastery
benefit: Modify biotech in half the usual time and cost; may take 10 on Mechanics checks for biotech work.

name: Expert Shaper
benefit: Reroll Treat Injury checks to repair or modify biotech devices.

name: Expedient Mending
benefit: Mend a damaged or disabled biotech device as a standard action instead of a full action.

name: Master Mender
benefit: When you temporarily mend biotech using Treat Injury, move +4 up the condition track and only move -3 down at the end of the encounter.

name: Skilled Implanter
benefit: When installing an implant you count as having the Biotech Surgery feat for attack bonus calculations (attack bonus is halved).

name: Affliction
benefit: When you damage an opponent with a Force power, they suffer an additional 2d6 damage at the start of their next turn.

name: Dark Healing
benefit: Life-drain attack vs a creature within 6 squares: ranged attack vs Fortitude; on hit deals and heals d6 per class level.

name: Improved Dark Healing
benefit: Increase Dark Healing range to 12 squares; on failure the effect deals and heals half damage.

name: Dark Healing Field
benefit: Once per encounter, affect up to 3 creatures within 12 squares with Dark Healing using Use the Force vs Fortitude; on success you heal half the damage dealt.

name: Dark Scourge
benefit: +1 attack vs Jedi.

name: Dark Side Adept
benefit: Reroll one Dark Side skill check.

name: Dark Side Master
benefit: Reroll any Dark Side skill check.

name: Sith Alchemy (create)
benefit: Create Sith Talisman (+d6 damage to Force powers or lightsabers, grants a Dark Side point on first use) or create Sith Weapons/Armor with Sith templates.

name: Drain Force
benefit: Once per encounter when you damage a Force-sensitive opponent, regain one Force power and the target loses one Force Point.

name: Force Deception
benefit: Use the Force replaces Deception checks and is treated as trained.

name: Stolen Form
benefit: Choose any Force Technique or a lightsaber form and add it to your usable options.

name: Wicked Strike
benefit: On a lightsaber critical hit, move the target 2 steps down the condition track.

name: Rapid Alchemy
benefit: +2 attack with a melee weapon; once per encounter you may forgo that bonus to gain +5 on a single damage roll.

name: Sith Alchemy (craft)
benefit: Create Sith Amulets, Sith Armor, Sith Talismans, or Sith Weapons per Sith Alchemy rules.

name: Cause Mutation
benefit: Transform a creature into a Sith Abomination or Chrysalis Beast under your control; process takes days and yields creatures with new class level.

name: Sith Alchemy Specialist
benefit: Modify items to add Sith Alchemy traits.

name: Focus Terror
benefit: Once per encounter all allies within 12 squares and line of sight move +2 up the condition track but take -2 to attack and skill checks for a number of rounds equal to your class level.

name: Desperate Measures
benefit: Once per encounter all allies within 12 squares and line of sight may make an immediate attack at -5.

name: Incite Rage
benefit: Once per encounter all allies within 12 squares and line of sight gain a +1 rage bonus to attack but suffer -2 Reflex Defense until end of encounter.

name: Power of Hatred
benefit: Once per encounter allies in line of sight with less than half hit points gain hit points equal to your class level.

name: Enhanced Vision
benefit: Make Perception checks as a swift action instead of a standard action.

name: Triangulate
benefit: Once per encounter, if you and allies have line of sight to the same target, you may reroll one ranged attack (each affected ally rerolls one attack).

name: Impenetrable Cover
benefit: While you are in cover, gain Damage Reduction equal to your class level provided you still have cover when attacked.

name: Mark the Target
benefit: When you damage a target with a non-area attack, one ally in line of sight treats that target as flat-footed.

name: Maximize Cover
benefit: If an opponent uses Aim to negate your cover, they must succeed on a Stealth check vs the attacker’s Initiative to remove your cover.

name: Invisible Attacker
benefit: If the target is unaware of you when you attack, your ranged attacks deal +1 damage die.

name: Soften the Target
benefit: When you damage a target with a ranged attack, one ally in line of sight ignores that target’s Damage Reduction and Shield Rating.

name: Shellshock
benefit: If you damage a target with an area attack, the target is flat-footed against you until your next turn.
